title: Wonder Work
author: Wonder Work
content: Today, I was really surprised to see an investment scene. I used to make various comments about investing in Bitcoin, and I talked a lot about long-term investments and short-term investments, but today, I saw a post. Although it was a post by someone on X about investing in BTC, he has been investing in Bitcoin for the past 8 years. He gets Bitcoin daily and has continued working hard while continuing his investment trend. I'm surprised when I see these things. I don't know if you have noticed this, but if you invest in Bitcoin, you should invest like him. He may have done a lot, but we should always keep what we can do within our capabilities.BITCOIN DCA JOURNEYI liked it very much, and in the future, I will also try to invest for such a long time. Those who are or will invest in Bitcoin will be motivated by seeing this. I'm sharing some other important posts with you:Never stop buying Bitcoin.8-year history of buying Bitcoin.

comments.author: Stalker22
comments.body: Quote from: Wonder Work on November 24, 2024, 05:28:46 PMI liked it very much, and in the future, I will also try to invest for such a long time. Those who are or will invest in Bitcoin will be motivated by seeing this. ~Well, this is certainly an intriguing little brag piece.  Cant blame the guy - who wouldnt want to brag about past investments that paid off handsomely? But cmon, lets get real here - if he hadnt began sinking cash into bitcoin the year prior to 2017's bull run, his portfolio would look totally different and  truthfully if we take those calculators online at their word, even putting 30 bucks a day into investments over the last 7 years still lands you nearer half a mil than a full one.

comments.author: I_Anime
comments.body: This is the beauty of investing in bitcoin for long-term, most folks just want to make it fast , just want to get to their destination once without any journey , and things don't work that way you take your time and build first. Bitcoin tend to favour Those that are patient, those that can literally build a good stash and hold it for long .Yeah this will actually motivate some investors to keep pushing and striving to a greater heights, just like are most users here that have been holding for long kept motivating us , I hope one day i will also motivate others to do the right thing.

comments.author: Ever-young
comments.body: This is impressive; he believed in what he was doing and has been doing it because he has something that is giving him money to be investing in bitcoin regularly without thinking about selling some off.  At least this is a long-term investment, and the profit is merit earned. It's not like those cooked-up stories that misinformed the people about how they made thousands of profit by just investing a few hundred in bitcoin without explaining and given how long it has been before they got that profit.  If we have something that's given us enough money to spare some instead of saving in fiat, I will also consider buying and accumulating bitcoin like this for a long time, maybe before my child will finish college. It can be enough money to inherit.

comments.author: coolcoinz
comments.body: That's pretty much how portfolios of all long-term bitcoin investors look. 800% is nothing special when you're in this space. Since I went through the 2017 bull run, I'm used to 1000% in bull markets  Congratulations to that guy and everybody else who survived the last bear market because it was pretty brutal, especially when we broke through $20k and kept going.Remember this next time bitcoin crashes 50% because it will. Know that every similar situation is an opportunity to change your life, just be patient ant consistent and you'll make it.

comments.author: tabas
comments.body: Very impressive. People who don't know what to do whether to buy at highs and lows are always skeptic of the thought of buying at any moment. But this guy, proved every odds of their thought shouldn't be like that and there's nothing wrong about buying every moment. He has literally done the impossible for them of buying everyday. Any amount will do but he's done it even at the highest of the market, only shows how firm he is in investing in Bitcoin.

comments.author: uneng
comments.body: Congratulations to every long term Bitcoin investors who have been patiently investing along the decade. Your efforts have been paid back nicely, with a much superior profit margin when compared to traditional investments offered by fiat institutions and governments. I guess it's not easy to think outside the box and invest on the exact opposite way everyone is doing and telling you to do. Despite the negativity faced due to hopeless commentaries of people around, Bitcoin investors still took their investments ahead and are proud participants of the supreme 2024's ATH.Everyone has their frustrations and struggles in life which are pretty hard to be surpassed, but in the end of this year of 2024, we have a very important reason to be thankful for after seeing all the progress which has been made in this industry along all the years and cycles we have passed.Be satisfied for that, and hopeful that the best is still to come.

comments.author: red4slash
comments.body: This is why many people say that being in bitcoin should at least be longer than imagined and it is not wrong if there are some people who think that investing in bitcoin is the best thing to support the future to match what we expect.Bitcoin has always been one of the innovations that is difficult to leave alone and this example is only one of the many people who managed to survive with the benefits of being in bitcoin and it went through a long process because if you look at the time devoted it is quite long but he managed to get through it.Now actually we only need to focus ourselves when we are really sure of bitcoin because after all for now, bitcoin is still very worthy of our investment especially if it is done for the long term.

comments.author: freedomgo
comments.body: If you start investing now, you’re unlikely to see the same kind of massive increase over the next 8 years. What you’re seeing now is the reward for early investors who took the risk back then. At the current price, that kind of growth seems less likely, but who knows? In Bitcoin, nothing is impossible. With its limited supply, if demand skyrockets again, it could surprise everyone.Holding for 8 years takes serious discipline, and that’s the true meaning of HODL. And speaking of trust, you should develop how to resist the temptation to cash out during a bull market or panic sell in a bear market and staying focused on your long-term goals.Good luck to you! It’s never too late to start investing and remain optimistic about Bitcoin’s future.

comments.body: Quote from: Wonder Work on November 24, 2024, 05:28:46 PMToday, I was really surprised to see an investment scene. He gets Bitcoin daily and has continued working hard while continuing his investment trend. I'm surprised when I see these things. I don't know if you have noticed this, but if you invest in Bitcoin, you should invest like him. He may have done a lot, but we should always keep what we can do within our capabilities.We don't have to follow his exact investing plans as we can invent our own and follow it and still make profits. Everyone is free to invest in the way that they'll be comfortable and it'll not make them to go broke. What he was doing is called DCA and you can invest through DCA in any way that you want but you have to be consistent for you to see results. I do mine monthly and I have good results too. I was looking at the image and it looks like he's up 10x from his invested capital. In 8 years for someone that has been investing in Bitcoin daily he barely has over one Bitcoin and it makes me begin to doubt if truly he was investing daily. I wonder too how much was he investing daily because if I was investing daily for 8 years I should have more than one Bitcoin by now. During the bear market that Bitcoin was very cheap, I should have accumulated many Bitcoin and be in a better profits than just 10x but that's massive gains too.

comments.author: EFS
comments.body: If you don't know how to trade or are hesitant to do so, regular buy-and-hold is the surest way to invest in Bitcoin that always works. In the past 15 years, Bitcoin has always seen new highs, meaning that no one who bought Bitcoin at any point has ever made a loss unless they sold. Everyone should invest a little bit of Bitcoin according to their budget, this is the proof that it's the right way to invest with no trading knowledge needed.

comments.author: Natalim
comments.body: This is impressive one. I have always believed that if you invest for bitcoin for such long years, the profits will also be like 1000x from your capital. Patience and having a stable source of income should always the keys as you can’t buy bitcoin continuously if you don’t have a sustainable flow of income. And since bitcoin is a long term investment, never rush to see your profits. If possible, just try to forget that you have bitcoin investment. Don’t be paranoid with its price fluctuations, and just focus on adding your bitcoin portfolio everytime you have excess money. After long indefinite years, you will come to reap what you have sow for long years.

comments.author: CryptoHeadlineNews
comments.body: And that's the benefits we stand to get when we invest in Bitcoin, rather than putting our money in our traditional fiat currency in banks. Because imagine turning $86,250 into $861,441 just within a space of 8yrs, a high profit margin that could never have been possible from any investment scheme, but yet Bitcoin made it possible. Hence, just as this user was able to generate over 800% extra profit of his initial investment, so can anybody benefit from this too, irrespective of your start up capital. Because imagine you had invested just $100, in 8yrs time your Bitcoin investment could have grown to over $800.

Because imagine turning $86,250 into $861,441 just within a space of 8yrs, a high profit margin that could never have been possible from any investment scheme, but yet Bitcoin made it possible. Hence, just as this user was able to generate over 800% extra profit of his initial investment, so can anybody benefit from this too, irrespective of your start up capital. Because imagine you had invested just $100, in 8yrs time your Bitcoin investment could have grown to over $800. That's over 100% yearly on the initial capital if we use as a basis, but if you put your moeny  in the bank, you'll get less than 3% per annum. However, it's a misconception to compare investing on bitcoin and saving your money to the bank because when you put your money to the bank, you aren't investing but instead you are just safekeeping your money. And of course it has a little risk as money is insured up to a certain amount, the only downside of just keeping your money is you'll be impacted with the inflatiion unlike investing with bitcoin is you beating it.

comments.author: mirakal
comments.body: Well, this is not surprising really if you have been buying bitcoin and adding it up to your portfolio for quite long years. However, it takes a lot of patience and understanding on a volatile market for you to be able to do that. Long term investment is really good, as long as you don't rely on your bitcoin for some emergency cases and unpredictable events. But if you are just a minimal income earner, keeping bitcoin this long is very hard. Still, this will serve as an encouragement to those who wants to make it big with bitcoin in the future.

comments.author: nelson4lov
comments.body: This is called believing in something and staying locked in on it. If I had the opportunity to ask him any question, it would be about learning of his experience and how he was able to stay disciplined and kept his conviction intact regardless of all the turbulence we had in Bitcoin's market.As we can see:— he bought when bitcoin went from $20K to $3K— he kept buying even when Covid-19 hit and the entire market crashed.— he still bought during the FTX saga.A good point to keep in mind is that he had an income source that afforded him the opportunity to pay his bills and still have enough to invest. It won't be possible without this bit.
